name: NextGEN TinyMce Description
author: Marco Buttarini & Giorgio Martello & Andrea Brugnolo

sections.description:
NextGEN TinyMce Description simply integrate tinymce wysiwyg to the description of the picture in a NextGEN gallery.

Credits

Developed with the help of Andrea Brugnolo & Giorgio Martello

sections.installation:
1. Copy the plugin in wp-content/plugins directory

  2. Activate the plugin

  3. Go to your “manage gallery” on NextGEN, you will see description textarea modified. There is no configuration panel

That’s it … Have fun
sections.faq:
It was broken for a long time, is it working now?

Thanks to Giorgio Martello now is working!
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • Fixed problems with new nextgen version

1.3

  • Fixed problems with wordpress 3.1 and TinyMCE

1.2

  • Fixed problems with wordpress 3.1

short_description: NextGEN TinyMce Description add native tinymce to nextgen gallery picture description.
